messages.title: Julian: the best choice for you
messages.content: CAMBRIDGE VOTERS FACE A CLEAR CHOICE on May 7 between popular local champion Julian Huppert and Labour's candidate.

messages.title: Lib Dems to protect full education budget
messages.content: The Lib Dems have announced plans to Protect the full education budget - from world of the cradle to college.

messages.title: Confirmed: Only Lib Dems will safeguard our NHS for the future
messages.content: Campaign group 38 Degrees has said that 'the NHS needs £8bn by 2020 - only the Liberal Democrats have committed to this'.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats plan to protect the full education budget, from cradle to college.
The Liberal Democrats are committed to investing the £8 billion per year the NHS says it needs by 2020.

issues.education: The Liberal Democrats plan to protect the full education budget, from cradle to college.
issues.health: Campaign group 38 Degrees has said that 'the NHS needs £8bn by 2020 - only the Liberal Democrats have committed to this'.

quotes.text: Julian and the local team keep in touch all year round, always fighting for the local community.
On all the key issues, Julian has stood up for Cambridge. He's an incredibly diligent caseworker and a regular visitor to our community.
I'm hugely grateful for Julian's work, championing the UK and its economy, research for the importance of scientific discovery.

images.caption: Lib Dems committing to full education budget.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet also mentions local champion Damien Tunnacliffe and promises pedestrian & cyclist safety improvements.
